PITTSBURGH -Integrationists
at the General Conference Of the
Methodist Church, unable to get
a ma jority in acknowledgements
maneuvering postponed intr oduc-
ton of a constitutional amend
ment designed to wipe out racial
barriers within the church.


1--WE thought we had consen-
sus to push this thing through
but we CONT" said the Rev. Dean
Richardson of Buffalo. N.Y.. a
leader of what he describes as
liberal forces.


The quadrennial conferences
900 delegates passed a plan to
eliminate voluntarily over the
next four years the church s CEN
trail Jurisdiction.

Novel party decorations use
balloons and stick-when-mols-
tened gift ribbon in various col,
ors. Blow up balloon to desired
size. Wrap ribbon diagonally
around and around, anchoring at
each intersection" with water or
library paste. Dunk quickly in
water and hang to dry. Puncture
and remove the balloon. You'll
have a rigid, cage-like ball. 5s

HOW TO MAKE


NOVEL DECORA1 IONS

The central Jurisdiction en-
braces $4,000 Negroes. 1t is
the only one Of six jurisdictions
based solely on race. The others
are geographic.


Postponement of the amend
ment's introduction halted fur
Their debate on the issue Of merg-
ing Negro and white congres;a-
lions.
